title: Midnight Bloom Satin Midi Dress
image_prompt: high-detail flat-lay product render of a satin midi dress, deep navy blue base with subtle floral jacquard pattern, A-line silhouette, short puff sleeves, sweetheart neckline, knee-length, fitted waist, invisible side zipper, delicate piping along neckline, isolated on plain white background, realistic fabric texture and sheen, visible stitching and trims
techpack: A-line satin midi dress with subtle floral jacquard weave, short puff sleeves, sweetheart neckline, fitted waist, knee-length hem. Invisible side zipper closure, neckline piping detail, fully lined for comfort. Fabric: 100% polyester satin with jacquard weave, lining: polyester crepe.
provenance: Inspired by the satin fabric trend, designed for commercial ready-to-wear with a timeless silhouette and subtle pattern.
